Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content:
@CoinKing88 regarding Verus wallet:
install the wallet like you would any other wallet.
create a new wallet, select create 256bit seed (iguana)
write down seed carefully as you would have done with your previous wallet

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Use the seed to log in, it will generate you a new R address

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: log out and log in again using the fresh seedphrase, check if the adress matches the one you generated earlier

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Keep seed and wallet adress close

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Log in to old wallet using your old (possibly compromised) seed and send your assets to the new address
